topics.body:
i dont think the seinfeld analogy works for us now tha ti see the show more

i mean the characters in seinfeld are all presented as completely horrible and nasty people who do mean things to EVERYONE around them...except themselves.

the group is friends with each other and is somewhat nice for no reason

they dont have any thing in common, no relation, nor live next to each other at all

they never have any moral message or friendship moment at all.

so yeah i think we are more on the "friends" deparment than the "seinfeld" deparment
